title: Topic 006 Question 015
body: You have a Microsoft 365 subscription that uses Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Plan 2 and contains a Windows device named Device1.
Twenty files on Device1 are quarantined by custom indicators as part of an investigation.
You need to release the 20 files from quarantine.
How should you complete the command? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
